params.text:
HARVESTING AND POST-HARVEST PRACTICES

Â 

The following are the recommended harvest practices for okra:

  • Harvest fruits 5-10 days after flowering. The fruits should be about 10-12 cm and harvest 2-3 times a week thereafter to obtain high yield.

  • Harvest when no more dew appears on the leaves to avoid itching.

  • Pack the fruits in polyethylene bags of 10 kg each to maintain freshness.
